body: Kakeru, the protagonist from #390276 had came to accept how the girls close to him are stolen from him. He move on with life, but the elite old man is not satisfied. This time, he made Kakeru into a girl, and turns her into his sex slave. But in the new life, Kakeru (now Kaoru) found a new way to revenge on the girls. He can satisfy her master better, and enjoy seeing the girls feeling insecure when their master praise her. They're jealous because she's becoming his favourite (and probably afraid he won't love them anymore). | page 9. Wearing maid uniform, then naked, then in maid uniform again next page. XD
